eforecast.name: e.forecast
eforecast.content_1: One day I was looking for the weather forecast noticed the lack of beautiful forecast websites available on the internet. Therefore, I came across the ideia of an application with fancy graphs and a nicier layout, using the

elearning.name: e.learning
elearning.content: In order to practice and stablish a solid connection with the next.js way of coding, I decided to develop a web application. Still, education is such an amazing area, and creating online tools so people can study in a better way is always nice.

calendar.name: Calendar
calendar.content: The idea of this project is to mock a calendar application, in which the user can register, retrieve and delete events. The interface is the computer terminal, and all of the magic happens there.

tcc.name: Mapping graph
tcc.content: Graph software developed for my high shool final paper. It's purpose is to display the 2D mapping performed by a LiDAR sensor.
